Chess Melee
Replaces Super Sudden Death
Edgeguarding like there's no tomorrow.
[Achilles]
Version -- DOL Offset ------ Hex to Replace ---------- ASM Code
NTSC 1.02 ----- 0x80032144 --- 7FC3F378 -> Branch

# Uses custom rebirth function @ 80003d40

2C030010 40820014
3C608000 60633D40

Dual 1v1 Mode
Replaces Giant Melee
Make every match a mini tournament.
[Achilles]
Version -- DOL Offset ------ Hex to Replace ---------- ASM Code
1.02 ----- 0x801b9060 ---- c002b268 -> 4e800020	# Disables SceneFunction_GiantMelee_ModifyPlayerValues

1.02 ----- 0x8016c094 --- 381DFFFF -> Branch

Turbo Mode (v1.3)
Replaces Single Button Mode
Allows players to cancel their moves upon hit.
<https://smashboards.com/threads/turbo-mode-replaces-single-button-mode-v1-3-20xx-4-07-compatible.449823/>
[UnclePunch]
Revision ---- DOL Offset ---- Hex to Replace ---------- ASM Code -

	-==-


Low-Poly v2
Use the game's low poly count models, as seen in off-screen bubbles, for the main on-screen character models.
<https://smashboards.com/threads/use-high-polygon-models-for-shadows-and-when-offscreen.446710/>
[UnclePunch, Yakult]
Revision ---- DOL Offset ---- Hex to Replace ---------- ASM Code -
NTSC 1.02 --- 0x800748DC ---- 7C1F202E -> Branch

3DE08023 81EF88EC
2C0F0000 41A2006C
3A26FA14 89D10007
2C0E0009 41820010
2C0E0017 4182001C
48000014 89D10619
2C0E0001 40820008
48000008 38800000
7C8F2378 7DDF782E
39EF0004 7E1F782E
7C0E8000 41820024
7C8F2378 7DDF782E
39EF000C 7DDF792E
39EFFFF8 7DDF782E
39EFFFFC 7DDF792E
7C1F202E 48000000

------------- 0x802288EC ---- 41820014 -> 00000000 # Debug Menu flag
